Membership Gift Certificates

#### The Gift of Membership

Available for you to give your favorite artist or supporter.

[Email us for details](mailto:sfwomenartists@sbcglobal.net)

## Become a Member of San Francisco Women Artists Community

**Applications for New Membership are Invited**

San Francisco Women Artists, (SFWA) a historic nonprofit arts organization, continues to support and promote Bay Area artists by providing opportunities to professionally exhibit and sell their work, and offers an inviting space for the community to experience art.  _SFWA welcomes all Bay Area artists_ _and_ _remains firmly committed to promoting equity in the arts for all people_

Your membership in SFWA brings you into its active and supportive art community, exhibits and sells your work in monthly themed shows showcasing juried art, holds events for networking, presents workshops, and also offers affordable wall space rental for individual shows of multiple works. The SFWA Gallery, located in the City’s vibrant Inner Sunset, is open 5 days a week and employs a full-time Gallery Director, features contemporary art, jewelry, ceramics and sculpture.
